about.textaboutme: Iâ€™m a Front-End Developer located in Mexico. I have a serious passion for my work. Well-organised person, problem solver, independent employee with high attention to detail. A family person i'll do everything for my family. Interested in the entire fullstack spectrum and working on ambitious projects with positive people.

moreaboutme.moreabout:
I graduated as a biochemical engineer at the 'Instituto Tecnologico De Durango', since I was little I was passionate about technology, so when I entered high school I became a technician in programming, at that time I developed sites in WordPress just for fun and also mounted several stores using Prestashop, then when I entered the university I began to study engineering in computer systems, I considered that the career did not have much to offer me so I chose a change to another of my great passions... the food industry so I studied biochemical engineering. 
 Since then I have dedicated myself to the specialized service of computer equipment and also to my own business, the production of handmade liquors with my own brand 'La tucita'. 
 Currently I am studying on my own to become a web developer, having the basis of my previous studies, it has not been such a hard road but this is just the beginning of what I hope to be a life project and I hope soon to be able to unite my two great passions in some way.
moreaboutme.hobbiedata: My hobbies are simple, I like the production of handmade food, from preserves to liquors, I like everything related to technology, video games... I loved playing world of warcraft, actually it is thanks to video games that I could learn English and improve my social skills, I also like to learn, I am aware that we can not do everything at the first try, every day we are able to learn something new.
